nodes.text: Tulia was a general in the military and officer corps of the Galactic Empire during the Imperial Era. In her mansion on the planet Haidoral Prime, the Imperial governor Everi Chalis kept a series of statues depicting major figures in the Empire, including Tulia, the Sith Lord Darth Vader, and Count Denetrius Vidian. In 3 ABY, a squad from the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry infiltrated the mansion and found the statues. The rebel soldier Brand listed the names of some of the individuals being depicted by the statues, including Tulia, to First Sergeant Hazram Namir, telling him to memorize the faces.
Tulia appeared as a statue in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
